title: WhatsApp on Windows XP,7,8,10 for PC (July) Final
description: Features of WhatsApp PC #1 Free: WhatsApp can be used to leave a message, call a person with an active internet connection, and by doing this, you don’t have to pay. #2 Media Exchange: You can receive pictures, documents, videos and voice texts using it. #3 Free Calls: As mentioned above, you can make voice calls using it even to family and friends who live outside the country without any service charges. #4 Group Chat: You can converse with multiple people at a time so that you can avoid texting the same thing twice or more. #5 WhatsApp Web: Here, you can use the WhatsApp for PC directly from your browser to send texts by typing them from the keyboard. #6 No Pins and Usernames: All you need to have is the number of the person you want to text, and you can get into contact with them easily within seconds. #7 Much more: You can send unlimited images, email the chat history, exchange contacts, set wallpapers, share the location using the WhatsApp messenger. WhatsApp PC Newly Added Features of WhatsApp on PC WhatsApp for PC has been updating the new versions regularly by fixing bugs, embedding new features in each version. The WhatsApp Latest Version that has been released on 10th November 2016 is WhatsApp 2.16.346 APK, and it has a whole set of new features added. The most significant feature is that WhatsApp has launched the video calling feature in the recent version which is yet to be officially activated for many users in different countries. Apart from that, it has introduced the SnapChat like filters where the user can doodle a pic with texts of different colors, add emojis to it before sending to another person. Also, using the [email protected] symbol, one can tag a person or a contact in the group conversation to address them. Minimum System Requirements of WhatsApp for PC The minimum operating system that is needed to install WhatsApp for PC is Windows XP SP3 with a .net framework 2.0. You should have the privilege of the administrator to use the user account. A minimum RAM of 2GB is required to install the WhatsApp PC. You should be VGA compatible so that the installation is not interrupted. How to Download WhatsApp for PC/Laptop? Let’s address the question initially. Why does anyone want to download WhatsApp for PC instead of using it on the phone? If you have huge chunks of text to send and you can’t do it on the mobile; you can use the PC version and send them up by typing from the keyboard. Also, the WhatsApp for PC version helps you to text while you’re doing something else and gives you the ability to multi-task. In some cases, you’re not officially allowed to use the phone in the office premises or the college premises; therefore you can then open the WhatsApp on PC and keep texting. The five major methods used in WhatsApp PC download are: Using the WhatsApp Web version. Install WhatsApp on PC through Bluestacks Player. Download WhatsApp for PC through Nox app player. WhatsApp Download for PC through Andyroid. WhatsApp for PC download through MEmu Emulator
